name: Copolymers of acrylamide, 2-(dimethylamino)ethyl methacrylate, itaconic acid, benzyl[2-(methacryloyloxy)ethyl](dimethyl)ammonium chloride, and benzyldimethyl[2-[(1-oxoallyl)oxy]ethyl]ammonium chloride, optionally crosslinked with hexahydro-1,3,5-tris(1-oxoallyl)-1,3,5-triazine.
FoodContactSubstance: Copolymers of acrylamide, 2-(dimethylamino)ethyl methacrylate, itaconic acid, benzyl[2-(methacryloyloxy)ethyl](dimethyl)ammonium chloride, and benzyldimethyl[2-[(1-oxoallyl)oxy]ethyl]ammonium chloride, optionally crosslinked with hexahydro-1,3,5-tris(1-oxoallyl)-1,3,5-triazine.
